QSvgBA.en:
[Local Villager]
Hmm, are you sure you should be fighting here?
These monsters seem tough for someone of your level.
QSvgBA.pt:
[Local Villager]
Hmm, are you sure you should be fighting here?
These monsters seem tough for someone of your level.

QivgBA.en:
[Local Villager]
Hey, you there. Yeah you!
Do you think you can help me with something?
QivgBA.pt:
[Local Villager]
Hey, you there. Yeah you!
Do you think you can help me with something?

RSvgBA.en:
[Local Villager]
I am trying to make my way through
but I can't seem to get past these
Demon Pungus. Can you help by
getting rid of them for me?
RSvgBA.pt:
[Local Villager]
I am trying to make my way through
but I can't seem to get past these
Demon Pungus. Can you help by
getting rid of them for me?

SCvgBA.en:
[Local Villager]
Thank you.
How many would you like to hunt?
SCvgBA.pt:
[Local Villager]
Thank you.
How many would you like to hunt?

TCvgBA.en:
[Local Villager]
I think if you can kill 50 of them, I will be safe enough to get through.
TCvgBA.pt:
[Local Villager]
I think if you can kill 50 of them, I will be safe enough to get through.

UCvgBA.en:

Wow, you're strong. Maybe too strong to help me with my simple task.
UCvgBA.pt:

VivgBA.en:

Any progress that you've made will be erased.
VivgBA.pt:
[Local Villager]
Are you sure that you want to stop hunting?

VyvgBA.en:

Ok then, well come back here if you change your mind.

WCvgBA.en:
